title: Science Job Competency Strengthening Course Through Digital Game-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic scientific theories and practical experience in the field of science
context.additional_context: An environment where current practitioners engage in game-based PBL projects using personal devices and receive continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and utilize at least three game elements that induce attention (Attention) in Digital Game-Based Learning (DGBL) environments.
Learners achieve over 80% task completion rates by linking game-based learning activities to job relevance (Relevance).
Using in-game performance evaluation (Satisfaction) systems, learners maintain confidence (Confidence) and perform three or more repeated gameplay sessions.
Learners analyze motivation and performance mechanisms to apply them to solving real-world scientific project problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
